entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.3°C

Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 10:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

Humidity: 85 %

Dewpoint: -5.4°C

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
